titleStmt.title: William Penn and the Quakers either impostors, or apostates which they please: proved from their avowed principles, and contrary practices. By Trepidantium Malleus.
titleStmt.author: Shewen, William, 1631?-1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the author, and are to be sold by John Lawrence at the Angel in the Poultrey,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; pages cropped and tightly bound, with faded print and some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
